page.title: 05 THE STONE MASON
page.content:
We have a stone mason who lives in Yelvertoft. He has lived there for 36 years. He likes Yelvertoft very much because he thinks its a friendly village.He is very happy in the house he lives in.He gets most of his stone from Stafford and cuts it with big saws. He works mainly in Alabaster, Marble and Lime-stone.Yelvertoft has its own stone, which is very hard, made mostly of fossils and is found about 6ft under the ground.It is coloured bluey-grey.The blocks that our stone mason receives weigh about 3 tons.
By JAMES WHITTAKER DAVID MULDOWNEY
